name: R5-ListMode-R4-ListMode
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ListMode into a FHIR R4 ListMode

element.display: A point-in-time list that shows what changes have been made or recommended.  E.g. a discharge medication list showing what was added and removed during an encounter.

target.display: A point-in-time list that shows what changes have been made or recommended.  E.g. a discharge medication list showing what was added and removed during an encounter.

element.display: This list was prepared as a snapshot. It should not be assumed to be current.

target.display: This list was prepared as a snapshot. It should not be assumed to be current.

element.display: This list is the master list, maintained in an ongoing fashion with regular updates as the real-world list it is tracking changes.

target.display: This list is the master list, maintained in an ongoing fashion with regular updates as the real world list it is tracking changes.
